title: Talon
body: I know it may seem like from the title that this "champion" I made up is called Talon. But wait. This isn't about champions. I just didn't know where to put this. I was thinking before that Talon has the worst set of skins. So I came up with an idea. I thought arcade talon. But that'd be weird. But something better. Debonair Talon. I was thinking when he Qs rose petals come off of them instead of blood. His W has different shurikens. His E has a spiral of neon blue lights where he blinked from. And his ultimate is like the W. Idk I thought of it on the spot and I'd like some feedback right now I'm making the splash art to see how he looks

replies.body: I think that's an awesome idea! I was playing talon a while ago and wanted to buy a skin for him, but like you said his skins aren't that great.. but this one sound way better! Would love to see the art for it.
